amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to strike an exemption that allows military chain of command or senior civilian leadership to approve the display of unapproved flags at military installations.
amendment.purpose: Amendment eliminates the discretion in current law allowing the military chain of command or senior civilian leadership to approve the display of unapproved flags at military installations.
